recentsd(8) System Manager's Manual recentsd(8)

NAME

recentsd —
recentsd daemon

DESCRIPTION

recentsd is used by Mail, Messages, and other apps on the system. It keeps track of recently used email addresses, phone numbers, and locations so you can use them again without adding them to your address book.

This command is not intended to be invoked directly.

January 1, 2017 macOS
